questions.q: Simplify: b-[b-(a+b)-{b-(b-a-b)}+2a]
4/15 of 5/7 of a number is greater than 4/9 of 2/5 of the same number by 8. What is half of that number?
Find the value of x in [(17.28/x) / (3.6*0.2)] = 2
If a/b=3/4 and 8a+5b=22,then find the value of a.
If x/4-x-3/6=1,then find the value of x.
If 2x+3y=34 and ((x + y)/y)=13/8,then find the value of 5y+7x.
If 2x+3y+z=55,x-y=4 and y - x + z=12,then what are the values of x , y and z?
A board 7ft. 9 inches long is divided into 3 equal parts . What is the length of each part?

A man divides Rs. Among 5 sons,4daughters and 2 nephews .If each daughter receives four times as much as each nephews and each son receives five times as much as each nephews ,how much does each daughter receive?
A man spends 2/5 of his salary on house rent,3/10 of his salary on food and 1/8 of his salary on conveyence.if he has Rs.1400 left with him,find his expenditure on food and conveyence.
A tin of oil was 4/5full.when 6 bottles of oil were taken out and four bottles of oil were poured into it, it was ¾ full. how many bottles of oil can the tin contain?
if 1/8 of a pencil is black ½ of the remaining is white and the remaining 3 ½ is blue find the total length of the pencil?

a crate of mangoes contains one bruised mango for every thirty mango in the crate. I three out of every four bruised mango are considerably unsaleble and there are 12 unsaleable mangoes in the crate then how msny mango are there in the crate?
From a group of boys and girls,15 girls leave.There are then left 2 boys for each girl.After this,45 boys leave.There are then 5 girls for each boy. Find the number of girls in the beginning?
An employer pays Rs.20 for each day a worker works and for feits Rs.3 for each day is ideal at the end of sixty days a worker gets Rs.280 . for how many days did the worker remain ideal?

kiran had 85 currency notes in all , some of which were of Rs.100 denaomination and the remaining of Rs.50 denomination the total amount of all these currency note was Rs.5000.how much amount did she have in the denomination of Rs.50?
